projects.projectDescription: This is a brand new endeavour to bring a fresh type of service targeted at designers, contractors and suppliers, it sells a collection of high-end planters but not just that. Designers often hustle among various outdoor product stores to find planter product that will work for the project, and it is often painful to put together all that information to communicate with others in the project. The goal is to build a minimalist and modern looking site that is easy to navigate for designers. It also needs to give designers the feeling of control, makes it easy for them to find planters by various criteria and share information easily with others.

projects.projectType: Team Project. Part of UI, build landing and two components
